title: BMB is over
body:
Everything from now on is a disappointment :/

The new items are exactly what League needed...
(inb4 but muh super OP infinite scaling item: put a cap on it. e-z)
(inb4 but muh super OP even better itemization for AP: make the books mutually exclusive. e-z)

And the brawlers were exactly what League needed..
